fixed_skill.desc: Increase party's Defense by 16.3%/17.1%/17.9%. For every 500 of the user's Defense, increase party's Defense by 2.7%/2.8%/3.0% more, up to 10.8%/11.3%/11.9%. Lasts for 3 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Marakukaja

innate_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 121.7/127.8/133.9% of Attack. 67.6/71.0/74.4% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Agidyne

innate_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 60.8/63.8/66.9% of Attack. 33.8/35.5/37.2% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Maragidyne

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment resistance by 25.4%. When an ally is inflicted with a debuff, increase target's ailment resistance by 25%.
passive_skill.name: Flame's Protection

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment resistance by 25.4%. When an ally is inflicted with a debuff, increase target's ailment resistance by 28.5%.
passive_skill.name: Flame's Protection I

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment resistance by 25.4%. When an ally is inflicted with a debuff, increase target's ailment resistance by 31.5%.
passive_skill.name: Flame's Protection II

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment resistance by 25.4%. When an ally is inflicted with a debuff, increase target's ailment resistance by 35%.
passive_skill.name: Flame's Protection III

showtime_skill.desc: Grant a shield to party equal to 48.6%/52.0%/55.4% Attack + 1471/1854/2275 for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
